review_text: Doesn't repel bugs as well as I would like... Doesn't repel bugs as well as I would like... Keep something better, like 40% deet, nearby in case things get hairy.

Frustrating. The voice recognition sounds ok. The user interface is straightforward, and I canâ€™t quickly figure out how to do anything.  I have two older Alexa speakers that I love and this was a good. I thought I could use this in the kitchen. Itâ€™s easier just not to let my phone lock bc I donâ€™t readily see otherwise.
Just ok. Its nice but i dont think the price matches with the quality and durability.

This stuff is stinky. I am sure it works but it smells pretty bad. Like fish in a trash can in the next room. I actually tried poring some out and mixing in rose essential oils to cover it. That worked for one day then the icky smell was back. Was it rancid? I donâ€™t know I just threw it away and felt good abt it. I have borage oil capsules and they donâ€™t smell like that if you open them up.
Love. I love the quality of these pads!  Will be purchasing again.  They are soft and absorbent.
Poor quality. Not as good as genuine , too much charcoal dark rinses off in the beginning
Expensive ! $100 yearly to maintain. Expensive, costly to use if you follow the guidelines and change every 6 months

Doesn't work anymore.. Today is November 9, 2019. The return window for this closed on 10-24-19. First I couldn't get it to turn on, then when I finally got it to power up it would not charge. I've used this thing very little. Mostly got it to watch TV Shows offline while waiting at Doctor's etc. If you do buy one of these spring for the extended warranty.
Runs small and stiff Velcro. Nice light weight fabric, but Velcro closure sticks to it so well that it's difficult to put on.  Also runs very small.

Rootbeer Licorice. This essential oil may be organic, it may be pure, but pure what? It smells nothing like any frankincense that I have ever smelled. It smells like rootbeer and licorice. Perhaps the distillation equipment is sullied with sassafras oil or something...I can't figure it out. Too good to be true for organic frankincense.

Arrived with stones missing. Two stones were in the bag that the tiara came in. It was a cheap tiara (price) but since more than one stone was out I don't have high hopes for durability. It is also noticeable that the stones are missing. I would not recommend.
Mmm, Coffee. Without this Cuisinart GTF-B Gold Tone Coffee Filter our coffee wouldn't the same.  It would be all over the floor, and full of coffee grinds.

Pretty sure this is a fake. Not the same wonderful scent as salon.. This smells nothing like the product I purchase at the salon or beauty supply. The can looks like it's the same, but it smells like nail polish. I am pretty sure it's a fake and I am disappointed.  Half of the reason I buy it is because of the scent.
Magnet Too Weak. The magnet is too weak to keep the product in place as you move the slider from Dirty/Clean.
Works great at good price. Works as intended, no issues.

Love it. If you're tired of spray bottles that soak your hair, your shirt, and leave water running down your face every time you try and wet your hair for styling, this is the product for you. I know that sounds corny, but it is a really good product.

Was Easy on the eyes. Forces me to watch AMAZON Prime VIDEO and Alexa keeps popping up. I can not access the books that I have purchase. I've spent over $100 for books and can't even read them. Not to mention the $200 for the Fire reader. Looks like electronic waste. No help from Amazon, ever.
Best sprayer ever!. This is the best water bottle ever. It delivers a constant spray and makes getting your hair wet super easy. A must have.

Youâ€™ll not save your money. Good price for 4 packs. But I would like to see better quality for this price. Sometimes it feels like a little rough. The rounds are too thin and youâ€™ll need to use more. I think itâ€™s not worth it because you can buy more expensive one and youâ€™ll use it same time like this one.
ok. ok
Comparison to Melitta #2 Filter. Quality good but size is much bigger than a Melitta #2 filter.

Not good for staying in. I like the sound quality the battery life is not good and the earbuds keep falling out of my ears. I did put the small earpiece on the earbuds but even with that and not moving they fall out.
You get what you paid for.. The "hairs" are easily detached and they are mounted on a flimsy piece of string. Very difficult to put on.
Better Than Alligator Clips. I have thick, naturally curly hair and these work better for me than alligator clips.

Excellent product, dispensing is very frustrating!. The wipes are not packaged well for dispensing.  They no longer pop up one after the other.  You have to use two hands to get them out of the package.
Nothing special. Noticed no benefits. Especially disappointing for the price point.
Not my favorite. These are ok,  it i prefer the brand name

Work well in a Keurig. Bought these for our own use. They work well. Much cheaper to use these than to buy k-cups. Loved them so now give as gifts to Keurig owners. Put in top rack of dishwasher. Fill them to the top or coffee not strong enough. Happy with this purchase.
Great value and product. This product is great for cleaning and this is a good price.
Two Stars. Doesn't brush hair fully. What's the point?
Great buy expensive. Great tissues. A bit expensive

Great replacement. These are more reasonabky priced than at my local home goods store.  I like this product it was as described by amazon and I am very happy with the product.  I will buy more if I find that I am in need of them.

Didnâ€™t work for me. It didnâ€™t really help keep my glasses up and wore off after a short while.  It may work for people with different shaped noses, I think glasses have a harder time staying on mine.
Great price for this quantity. Is it just me? Or has the company started using less LOTION in their product.  Itâ€™s just the same as using regular puffs of Kleenex.
Four Stars. does the job. kinda wobbles on the dryer
Works Great. I read that making tea from the leaves and not the bag is healthier.  So I bought this and it works well.
Sound Quality is good but it falls off my ear. Sound quality is good however it falls from my ear even with the adjusted ear pieces. Overall a good product

DEAD ON ARRIVAL. I ALWAYS PURCHASE IN ADVANCE SO I HAVE IT WHEN NEEDED.. INSTALLED IT TODAY AND IT WOULDN'T WORK.
HAD A SPARE REPLACEMENT MADE BY CULLIGAN AND IT WORKED PERFECTLY. SINCE IT HAS BEEN THREE MONTHS, NO OPTION TO RETURN IT..

Horrible! Returned. If I could give it less than 1 star I would. I returned because water went everywhere, I mean everywhere! I truly tried to figure out why and never could. I believe it it because the bottom is mesh. I compared it to my original Keurig filter and that one worked just fine.  Horrible! don't waste your time of money.

Dried out after first use. Not as expected
It worked well one time then dried out.
It did not come with a pump so it is .... It did not come with a pump so it is very difficult to use in the shower because of this reason I will not order it again!

Works great for softening Eucalyptus leaves. I bought this to soak Eucalyptus leaves in for use in arrangements.  Works great - you can find detailed instructions online.  Also good as a dry skin moisturizer - I like that it's all natural!
Didnâ€™t work. I tried it on my babyâ€™s onesies and it didnâ€™t take off the stains at all
Good quality. Larger than expected but it will be used.
Wish it held more. I love this bottle. Use it everyday just to mist my hair with my moisturizing concoction. But I wish it held more water.
Terrific. The port for power isn't what I would like to have
Your being ripped off. Great concept but once you stop all the subscriptions your stick doesn't work anymore.
It works!. Awesome product! No odor. Glasses stay where they need to be. Simple solution to a constant problem!
Filter failed in 1 week. This filter failed in 1 week.. not sure if the filter is defective or water had too much dirt to filter out.
What Happened?. These crumble faster and don't hold water as they used to. Will be looking for another brand.

I don't really have anything good to say about the sticks. I don't really have anything good to say about the sticks.  Their slow.  Go with the firebox it's way more responsive and is faster and gives smooth video. I'd recommend the roku express over this.  Sling is horrible on this as well.
Solid product.. Works best on clean glasses. Slick packaging.

Great Find.. So glad that I found this item. I HATE the Listerine caps.  They can be so difficult to open (I don't know why everything needs to be "childproof" but that's a whole other discussion).  This allows the liquid to be dispensed without a fight.

Very easy to set up. I have not done much with the firestick yet but my son had one and I liked the options for TV. I mostly watch networks but plan to use a lot when reruns are on. I liked the ease of setting it up and getting around on it.
BEST STAIN REMOVER EVER!!!!. THIS IS THE BEST STAIN REMOVER EVER!!!!!!

Dead within one year.. Purchased on 1/25/16 and worked great up until it didn't. The speaker is less than one year old and will no longer accept a charge. Given the astoundingly high rating, I didn't give any thought to its warranty (90 days) or its long term prospects.
Works fine. Box was slightly damaged and the bottle itself had some scratches on it, but it still works fine. Not exactly "new" though.
GOOD!!. GOOD!!
Four Stars. Good price
Garbage for the most part. Audio is inconsistent. Have had 2 pairs, neither sound the same except both are awful. Tinny, overdriven, with crackling.

Not the improvement I thought it would be.. It's fast connecting BUT it drops connection after 30 -40 minutes. How it drops signal is not consistent. At times it freezes completely and like last night picture kept playing but sound cut out. In all cases had to unplug and reboot. At least two times and one five times.
Awesome product!. This is my first tablet and I love it! It does everything I needed to do and then some. Highly recommended this!
works. needs a better magnet almost to big.

Hard to Use. I was really excited to try this but I found it hard to use.  The cloth is very long and even when I bunch it up I feel like I am not able to easily scrub my skin.  It tends to slide around under my hand but not on my skin. I tried cutting it up but had the same problem.  It also frays if you cut it up. Oh well, at least it wasn't expensive.
Five Stars. Washed my dirty dogs

' Great solution for those with glasses. One of those things that make you say 'why didn't I invent this?' Great solution for those with glasses, especially ones with frames that can't really be adjusted.
Not for 2.0. My kids have one. Works great but, not in my new 2.0 machine. They do not tell you that until you read the directions

The rubber band securing the diffuser to the dryer snapped .... The rubber band securing the diffuser to the dryer snapped right away. I can still use it, but it falls off mid dry session and I'm constantly picking it up off the floor.

why it has froze up on me. I was trying to charge it and the screen totally froze up on me and therefore wouldn't even take a charge

I bought the short handle ones and wish I had .... I bought the short handle ones and wish I had the longer handle ones. (It is a learning curve to get them into the ear correctly) A friend has a longer handle pair and she finds them so much easier to place in her ears and actually you can't see them in her ear. I wish I had the longer handle ones.
The case is an extra plus.
Stains still there!. It does not get stains out like the DREFT spray I bought years ago.
Not Kool enough. I meant to order the cool Kleenex  Those are thicker and way softer

Works great. Did the job. Definitely remember - dry fingers only when pulling out the soap sheets. For a pair of washable black trousers, I had to use two sheets, but they came clean in the hotel sink!
One Star. If the Velcro isn't done just right, it just shreds this product. It's absorbency is about nil.
Decent sound quality.. The speaker sounds sufficient. I used it all the time including on my boat.
One Star. Smelled fine but did nothing to keep Mosquitos away

Awesome. I love this product. It does not take 1-2 minutes thos not even. I applied 3 times to get to the point I wanted and to cover all spots. Once you have a lot of hair it takes longer. I still dont know how long it lasts but I like the results so far.

Definitely not for me. All I could get were .... Definitely not for me. All I could get were some of the movies and I already have Netflix. I had to sign up and buy all the apps to watch channels. I don't understand what the difference is.
Amazing tv. Works great but this is the 2nd one I purchased in 3years.  Very upset.  Should last longer.

It is a piece of junk.. Very disappointed.  I had all kinds of trouble getting it hooked up to the internet.  Once I got it hooked up the signel coming from the Fire I had to stand over my motum.  All my other devices worked fine.  It is a piece of junk.
Great!. It's works perfect. I just press microphone and say what i want to watch. Helps!!

Cheap and Work Well. Cheap and work well.  I bought these because they were cheap and I'm always tearing mine up during weed eating season.  I figured I would buy a few pairs of these and see if they would hold me over.  They seem to work well and I have not had any issues.  They may lack bass but they hold up rather well, especially for the price.
Silicone Stove Gap Covers. They don't fit properly.
Sparkly Tiara. The Tiara is sparkly and seems well made.  It's not very flexible or comfortable to wear.  But for the statement that it makes it is worth the discomfort.

Really expensive. This stuff is good; it makes my contacts feel more comfortable and certainly keeps them cleaner. But this stuff is so damned expensive! It probably cost pennies to make and they run up the price because they have market share. With the way you have to use the product you run out of it super quickly and realize you've just blown $15 on a few weeks worth of contact cleaner. Crazy!

Good to use with my coffee when I run out .... Good to use with my coffee when I run out of the prefilled pods or want another flavour.  Unfortunately the fine grounds leak out a bit - I had to buy filters to use with these, but the work well for a good cup of coffee in my keurig.

Great for filtering any boiled comestible ingredients. I use this to filter odd boiled things in my kitchen like hops or tea. very handy stainless steel filter, useful long after the coffeemaker was retired.

Logitech M570 FAILURE to connect to PC!. Logitech Wireless Trackball M570 will NOT pair or connect with Logitech USB dongle anymore...:-(
Have uninstalled/reinstalled Logitech SetPoint software MANY times, but this Logitech M570 does not EVER connect!

Please advise, it "used" to work well, on another PC!!!

Nah. Its a miss. I like it alot when it works. I find it going offline too many times for me to think its great. Idk if other brands do this or if just this brand. Too bad because thats one of the biggest reasons I bought the echo, so I could control lights

Poor voice recognition. I have two other Alexa devices. This one has very poor voice recognition. Often I cannot get it to even turn off by command. Sometimes it will suggest using "Alexa exit" which oddly enough never works. The other two devices work quite well. Only the Echo 5 fails so miserably l.
Falls apart upon contact with any surface. These are awful.  They fall apart as soon as they touch anything.  I'm lucky to get one use out of a sponge.

Better deal than in stores!. I paid $42 for this on Amazon. Best Buy has the dame card for roughly $10-$12 more. Shipped fast and as described. We used this for my sons new Wii Switch.  Would recommend.
Easy to use. Convenient to use, sprays a fine mist which is way better than dripping wet.

static. I like it, but it fills my hair with static every single time I use it.  On advice from a friend, I tried using dryer sheets with it.  That didn't work.  Can anyone tell me how to stop this problem so I can use this brush?
If you don't pick this up right it falls apart. If you don't pick this up right it falls apart. It came timely however I would not repurchase this item
love. works great, easy to set up. its perfect.

Not Happy. This was not an samsung replacement but a counterfit.  The one I ordered for a replacement was suppossed to have been mineral water filter. Not fresh water. It should have stated it was not a samsung filter.  The box looked old. It was made in Mexico. My water does not taste as good.
One Star. Broke the second I used it, doesn't stick in place, had to request a refund
For any decor.... Easy and simple sige. It goes to any decor discreetly.

smells great, works miracles. My number 1 item in my outbreak treatment regiment, smells great, works miracles. I use it as well every night on my lips before falling asleep, to make it work the best results plus as a delicate lip skin care product, as well as a qonderful eyecare cream. Highly recommended for your health :)
We love it. So glad to be done with old fashioned curling irons that your hair gets caught in or leaves crimped marks. This thing is amazing!

Family Doesn't Understand.... I got this as every time I do dishes and clean the sink out, I thought it would be easier for my family to see whats up with the dishwasher. I keep it on Dirty until its full then start it and slide to Clean. Well, it works great for me. Only problem is,, my family STILL dumps they're dirty dishes in the sink! If it only came with a family training guide....

Great idea, but one design flaw. Nice idea, with one design flaw.  Bought it to fill the k-cup without spilling coffee grounds, however, there is a groove in the handle the same side as the fill cup, and coffee gets caught isn't here, so when I turn it to dump it into the k-cup, the coffee that got caught in the groove in the handle still spills out into the counter.
Not worth it. Poor quality
Broken in 20 minutes. What we ordered was to be GOLD and it came in Rose Gold. We didnâ€™t have time to send it back and it broke within 20 minutes of wearing it.
Excellent filter, but way overpriced. Filter works great, but very over priced.  Other options work just as well for less than half the price.
Can not control volume. Volume is disappointing LOW and I can not raise it any higher. If I would have known I would not have bought it.
Two Stars. LOOKS CHEAP
Cheap quality. Cheap price. Donâ€™t bother they are horrible.. They are so cheaply made,thin plastic they snapped first use.
Great product, but the cost is up there. Great product,but the cost is up there. In six years of buying filter would have payed over half of the cost of the refrigerator.

Not returnable. When this item arrived the main large stone(or should I say glass) was loose in the bag.  When I tried to do a return, I received a notice that it was not eligible.  This is not stated in the ad.

it feels like it is exfoliating. Because of the roughness, it feels like it is exfoliating.  But I noticed when I am removing self tanner after a few days - it does nothing.  Yet, I can use a wet facecloth and take off all the self tanner without a problem.  And the tanner is just on the outer layer of dead skin, which I assume is coming off with the facecloth.
Four Stars. these are fun, thank you for selling online

I think I prefer the simple Melitta more. I am a coffee geek. I respect Hario filters and the V-60 but actually, I do prefer the simple Melitta plastic filter and/or Chemex. Just seems like the Melitta, although cheaper filters the coffee at a slower pace resulting in a more flavorful cup. I own three different Hario filters and use the Hario grinder religiously.

Meh. Another spontaneous purchase based on recommendation.
Find it thoroughly useless. Makes too much noise and after having it on for multiple days in a very small walk in closet, I saw no improvement in quality of air whatsoever.
Thumbs down.
Doesnâ€™t last, not waterproof. Lasted 3 months, says waterproof but sweat creates problems, then stop working. Save your money.

the price was good though.. It's alright not a brush expert but I was not impressed by it.
It's whatever, the price was good though.
Much better than 7 inch. Have had the 7 inch fore a couple of years and this was on sale so I got one, wow the picture is much better battery life is good also.

got so frustrated trying to find a more affordable alternative .... got so frustrated trying to find a more affordable alternative to these that I accidentally bought the bleached type when I usually get unbleached.

Great quality. So happy with this purchase. Great quality. So happy with this purchase. I've been using it in my face and body lotion, moisters the lips great too.
Four Stars. works good

good bang for the buck. Perfect.  Got these as a Warehouse Deal.  I try and replace my drip trays once a year, usually before a trek to see my parents and I will need a housesitter.  I like my stove to look super clean.  These fit our decade old generic manufactured home stove perfectly.  No complaints or regrets.

Stained my face, my hair and it smelled awful!. I have used sea buck oil before but decided to switch manufacturers.  I have got fantastic results from my other oil; but I am turned off my the color and the smell.  Going back to my former brand which is sold on Amazon!
Cotton Fluff EVERYWHERE!. Junk. Not sealed edges so there is cotton fluff everywhere...including your eyeball.
BIG and cheap. Great value for the money, but they do smell strongly of plastic until they outgas. I've used one for years and just ordered another for the future.
Very nice.. Nice but it still allows water to reach the back of my hair.
Never tried, wish I hadn't. They are too weak, strange, and just get paper dust and particles in your nose and eyes. Just get regular, and use real lotion as needed. Not soothing, more like annoying

Best drain remover. Best stain remover ever.  When my dog lifted his leg on the floor, it also hit the drapes.  I sprayed with Dreft and it didn't leave a stain. This also happened on my bedspread.  I use it on all stains including coffe/tea that gets splashed on the furniture.  PS.  Got rid of the dog.

Castor oil has so many health benefits !!!. This is an excellent product. I am using a small amount in a makeup remover oil blend and itâ€™s great. Iâ€™m also putting one drop in each eye before sleep because I have dry eyes and small cataracts.

Exfoliate your tucass off!. Been using these now for over 6 years, no change in quality at all, just price. As with everything with this lousy economy and high inflation, this is to be expected..... Unfortunately. But the product rocks. Head to toe exfoliation with every shower!

Great stuff! Works awesome on all baby. Great stuff! Works awesome on all baby, kid and adult stains. Formula, spit up, baby food and leaky diapers. Works better than any other stain remover I've tried!
Cheaply made. Had higher expectations. Weak, loose, noisy. The roller ball is a distraction instead of an asset. Trying for years to replace a Microsoft Trac-ball. This is a swing and a miss.
Cute but cheaply done.. It looked cheaper in person.  It is okay.  The free ring that came with it was very cheap.  Sorry seller, but this is my opinion.
GE refrigerator water filter. Works well.  Very expensive!
Not exactly what I expected. Not exactly what I expected
Four Stars. Really nice and thick VG w/excellent taste. I use this in all my DIY projects,
Five Stars. works great

I am learning. The Dot was a gift to me. I have just begun with her.
My vision is very limited and I can now listen to my Audible books easily, adjust the volume, pause and start again at my convenience.
That is so wonderful and I will be exploring more of what Alexia has to offewr.
She does answer almost any question I can think of!

Can someone explain why an $10 part costs $50?. Fridge filter is carbon. Not much else. I can buy an entire reverse osmosis system filter kit for 12 months (which would include 2 carbon filters) for $35-40. My previous fridge filters had been $7-8. Why does Whirlpool filters now go for over $50, with no 3rd party options available?
Best Hairspray Ever!. Doesn't stink like other brands and holds my hair on place without looking sticky.

Keurig My K-Cup. i think it would be good but i ordered it for a machine at work not realizing it was a commercial keurig and i could not use the filter.

Otherwise, I am happy with the order and the timely fashion it arrived at my house.
Not for coffee. Not good for coffee does not keep it warm and if u use espresso it comes out muddy not smooth. This was meant for teas only it seems
Get this you will love it.. I have a space heater plugged into it. It turns the heater on and off many times during the day and night. It works great with my Alexa.

Not a fan of straw hair. I wanted to like, actually live, this but every time I use it my hair looks and feels like straw.  I think it strips the natural oils and since my hair is dry, it just doesn't work for me.  I can't even get s comb through my hair and it feels so dry, I just can't use this.  Sadly, I'm returning it.
Disgusting smell. I'm sure this works fine but I'll never know.  The overwhelming smell of acetone was so bad I immediately got a severe headache - horrible.

I really wanted to like and endorse it since I am a fan of .... sorry to say I don't think this was worth the money spent. I really wanted to like and endorse it since I am a fan of shark tank, but just another thing to keep track of in the drawer or purse. didn't really solve my issue.

no. Very hard to use, maybe it's just me.

Interference with external bluetooth DAC. Instead of connecting directly to the speaker with Bluetooth, I wanted to connect my phone via bluetooth to an Arcam miniBLINK which would connect to the speaker via 3.5mm. Unfortunately, there was interference and the speaker made a constant high-pitch sound. Not the most common use-case for this speaker, but I'm disappointed that it didn't work.
Sizable. Nice size

Good product for the price. It's working so far :-) I purchased one a while ago ( I think about 5 months ago ) and plug it in not far from litter box . It works , maybe not whisper quiet ( I can hear it working , not too loud but identifiable :-) , so I bought second one for my bathroom .

Three Stars. Doesn't last as long as I thought it should. Makes lashes feel a bit brittle.
Too big for RV seat. was way too big for RV seat, made it look sloppy and uncomfortable
Hair clips. clips hold up very well and i love the colors  i wear hair extension so good for holding up my hair while it straighten my hair
Not too smooth. Claims to not leave behind lint but definitely leaves behind little bits of fuzz.  Not super absorbent.  Actually feels a little rough.
Easy to use. I liked it. It's easy to use.

Excellent speaker. Great sound, great connectivity.
Not returnable and it came the jar was open.big mess. Wasted my money. Couldn't use it, it was open and a mess not returnable
Worked well. Worked well on my long curly hair.

Not effective, curls don't last. I have several hot brushes, but most are hot air.  I wanted to try this concept for quick style touchups.  It doesn't work nearly as well as the hot air brushes, doesn't get that hot, and the styling doesn't last for me--and my hair curls quite easily.  I just don't use it, but always go back to my old hot air brush.
Meh!. Arrived with jewels missing. But should have expected that since the shipped is USPS luckily it was at the bottom of the crown and was hidden by my hair. I guess you get what you paid for.
Two Stars. Don't work very well.
Didn't fit. Solidly made, but didn't fit my Listerine bottle.
DOES NOT FIT A GE. LARGE SIZE DOES NOT FIT PROPERLY

Easy to navigate. The Fire HD has some issues for me (1)hard to return screen to home by tapping the middle of the screen  (2) swiping from side to unlock with code has to be swiped more the 3 times(4)3 of the 5 free offers did not work with the activation codes Alexa was asked question with unknown answers that were not correct
Works well.  But nite it does not support power use monitoring.. Great when on sale.  Wish it had power monitoring capability
Not for me. I have friends who swear by the effectiveness of this product for pain relief, so I don't want to condem it entirely.  What I can say is that I got zero benefit from using it.

Good stuff. I think this is the best contact lens solution I've used since I haven't experienced blurry contacts or random burning when putting them on. The only problem is that it doesn't really last because you have to use so much in the case compared to others. I've only been using it for one month and i'm almost done with one bottle.
Very handy for your looseleafs.. Very convenient and well put together.  Definitely beyond worth the price.  It does sometimes worry me that I'm steeping plastic in boiling water.

Don't make a bit of difference in my home. I put one in my tiny office and another in my living room to help with cigarette smoke and animal odors.
